QuestData.Title: Egg Evac
QuestData.Description:
The Primalists have stolen our eggs for their perverse rituals! They must be stopped.
Help us recover our eggs before it is too late. Mark each egg as you find them, $p. I will ensure they are safely extracted from the area.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 4 eggs from the Flashfrost Enclave.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Majordomo Selistra at Flashfrost Enclave.
